description.value: A set of codes that define an anatomical or acquired body structure site. Selected from the SNOMED CT UK coding system: - DescendantOf 442083009 | Anatomical or acquired body structure (body structure) | - DescendantOf 278001007 | Nonspecific site (body structure) |
